title: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style 5400, (2 Pack) Medium Carolina Blue-Maroon
features: Made in the USA or Imported
description: 100% preshrunk cotton, Weight of Heavy Cotton T-Shirt is 5.3 Oz, Ribbed cuffs, Tag label, Seamless Rib at neck, Taped shoulder to shoulder, Double-needle stitching throughout, Ash Grey is 99% cotton, 1% polyester, Sport Grey is 90% cotton, 10% polyester, Stock available in 15 different colors, Sizes upto 3XL
